# ======================
# IGNORE FOR MVC PROJECT
# ======================
mvc-app/bin/
mvc-app/obj/
*.user
*.suo
*.csproj.user
*.dll
*.pdb
*.log

# =========================
# IGNORE FOR ANDROID PROJECT
# =========================
android-app/build/
android-app/.idea/
*.iml
local.properties
.gradle/

# =========================
# COMMON IGNORE
# =========================
# Ignore IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
